results.name: Abomination
results.description: Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!

results.name: Absorbing Man
results.description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal ability, this card copies it.

results.name: Adam Warlock
results.description: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, draw a card.

results.name: Aero
results.description: On Reveal: Move all enemy cards played this turn to this location.

results.name: Agatha Harkness
results.description: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

results.name: Agent 13
results.description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

results.name: Agent Coulson
results.description: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 5-Cost card to your hand.

results.name: America Chavez
results.description: You always draw this card on turn 6, and not before.

results.name: Angel
results.description: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your deck to replace it.

results.name: Angela
results.description:
After you play a card here,
+2 Power.

results.name: Ant Man
results.description: Ongoing: If you have 3 other cards here, +3 Power.

results.name: Apocalypse
results.description: When you discard this from your hand, put it back with +4 Power.

results.name: Armor
results.description: Ongoing: Cards at this location can't be destroyed.

results.name: Arnim Zola
results.description: On Reveal: Destroy a random friendly card here. Add copies of it to the other locations.

results.name: Attuma
results.description: If you have another card here at the end of your turn, destroy this.

results.name: Baron Mordo
results.description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card. Set its Cost to 6.

results.name: Bast
results.description: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to 3.

results.name: Beast
results.description: On Reveal: Return your other cards at this location to your hand. They cost 1 less.

results.name: Bishop
results.description: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

results.name: Black Bolt
results.description: On Reveal: Your opponent must discard the lowest-Cost card in their hand.

results.name: Black Cat
results.description: If this is in your hand at the end of your turn, discard it.

results.name: Black Panther
results.description: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

results.name: Black Widow
results.description: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.

results.name: Blade
results.description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.
